com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.t: Add relevant identifiers or categories to the doc. Useful for organizing content, improving searchability, and grouping related docs together.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.c: Use a checkbox to indicate whether a condition is true or false. Useful for confirming options, toggling features, or tracking task states.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.d: Use a date field to select or display a specific date. Useful for scheduling, setting deadlines, or recording important events.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.i: Upload images to display or manage them. Useful for showcasing visual content, adding illustrations, or organizing a gallery.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.m: Select one or more options. Useful for categorizing items, filtering data, or managing tags.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.n: Enter a numeric value. Useful for quantities, measurements, or ranking items.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.p: Set a progress value between 0 and 100. Useful for tracking completion status, visualizing progress, or managing goals.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.s: Choose one option. Useful for selecting a single preference, categorizing items, or making decisions.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.l: Enter a link to websites or LoveNotes docs. Useful for connecting to external resources and referencing internal docs.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.t: Enter text. Useful for descriptions, comments, notes, or any other free-form text input.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.c: Displays the author of the current doc. Useful for tracking doc ownership, accountability, and collaboration.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.u: Displays the last editor of the current doc. Useful for tracking recent changes.
Record the last modification timestamp. Useful for tracking changes, identifying recent updates, or monitoring content freshness.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.c: Track when a doc was first created. Useful for maintaining record history, sorting by creation date, or auditing content chronologically.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.d: Select the doc mode from Page Mode, Edgeless Mode, or Auto. Useful for choosing the best display for your content.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.e: Select the doc theme from Light, Dark, or System. Useful for precise control over content viewing style.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.p: Control the width of this page to fit content display needs.
com.lovenotes.page-properties.property.t: Mark this doc as a template, which can be used to create new docs.

Beyond Recording
Your AI Meeting Assistant is Here
Native Audio Capture, No Bots Required - Direct from Your Mac to Meeting Intelligence.
Meeting Features Available Free in Beta Phase

Where AI meets your meetings - lovenotes your collaboration.
  • Extract Action Items & Key Insights Instantly
  • Smart Auto-Capture Starts With Your Meeting
  • Seamless Integration Across All Meeting Platforms
  • One Unified Space for All Your Meeting's Context
  • Your AI Assistant with Every Meeting Context Preserved

com.lovenotes.upgrade-to-team-page.benef: Team Workspace gives you everything you need for seamless team collaboration:
Invite unlimited members to your workspace
Set custom roles and permissions for better control
Perfect for growing teams and organizations that need professional collaboration tools.

com.lovenotes.payment.sync-paused.title: Workspace sync paused
Your workspace has exceeded both storage and member limits, causing synchronization to pause. To resume syncing, please either:
Reduce storage usage and remove some team members
Upgrade your plan for increased capacity
Your workspace has exceeded its storage limit and synchronization has been paused. To resume syncing, please either:
Remove unnecessary files or content to reduce storage usage
Upgrade your plan for increased storage capacity
Your workspace has reached its maximum member capacity and synchronization has been paused. To resume syncing, you can either
Remove some team members from the workspace
Upgrade your plan to accommodate more members
com.lovenotes.payment.sync-paused.member: This workspace has exceeded both storage and member limits, causing synchronization to pause. Please contact your workspace owner to address these limits and resume syncing.
This workspace has exceeded its storage limit and synchronization has been paused. Please contact your workspace owner to either reduce storage usage or upgrade the plan to resume syncing.
This workspace has reached its maximum member capacity and synchronization has been paused. Please contact your workspace owner to either adjust team membership or upgrade the plan to resume syncing.
